name: Himesh Patel
description: British actor known for roles in 'Yesterday' and 'Tenet'.

content.title: Biography
content.body: Himesh Patel is a British actor born in 1990 in Cambridgeshire, England. He developed an interest in acting at a young age and was involved in local theater productions. Patel made his television debut as Tamwar Masood on the long-running British soap opera **'EastEnders'**, a role he played from 2007 to 2016.

content.title: Career
content.body:
Himesh Patel gained international recognition for his leading role in the 2019 musical comedy film **'Yesterday'**, directed by Danny Boyle, where he portrayed Jack Malik, a struggling musician who wakes up in a world where The Beatles never existed. His performance was well-received, emphasizing his musical talents as he performed several classic Beatles hits.

In 2020, Patel appeared in Christopher Nolan's sci-fi thriller **'Tenet'**, showcasing his versatility as an actor in high-concept films. Patel has continued to work on various projects across film and television, contributing to both British and international cinema.

content.title: Notable Collaborations
content.body: Patel has worked closely with prominent filmmakers such as **Danny Boyle** and **Christopher Nolan**, further cementing his place in the film industry.
